dashboard.name:
Hi there,
My name is Doan Thanh Tung
dashboard.description: With over two years of experience, I have developed mobile applications as a Fltter developer. Both front-end (Fltter,Dart) and back-end (PHP, MySQL,Firebase) are my areas of expertise. I have sccessflly deployed mltiple applications on CH Play and the Apple Store. Additionally, I have experience integrating third-party APIs sch as Grab and Nhattin. I am eager to learn, very adaptive, and always p for a challenge.
